alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:50AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and northeastern Franklin Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 149 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Marks to 15 miles south of Crawfordville to 8 miles east of Carrabelle. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Woodville, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Newport, Carrabelle Beach, Shadeville, Wakulla Springs, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Bethel, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Alligator Point, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa and Turkey Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
